data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus contorta (Lodgepole pine) from sample YOSE-21

Exposition E, Slope 10 deg, Geology: Silikat Hangschutt, Tree line 3090 m, av. Tree height 20 m, Tree cover 60%, Shrub cover 10%, Herb cover 80%, Vegatation type: Viel Jungwuchs. Drainiert. Homogen, Film number: 702A
